items.content_html: A simple file transfer app for sharing files over a local network. Built with React (frontend) and Express.js with Socket.io (backend), it enables real-time file sharing without the internet. Features drag-and-drop upload, secure handling with Multer, and a web-based UI for easy access. Fast, lightweight, and ideal for local networks.
items.title: Rahul1342002/file_transfer_app: A simple file transfer app for sharing files over a local network. Built with React (frontend) and Express.js with Socket.io (backend), it enables real-time file sharing without the internet. Features drag-and-drop upload, secure handling with Multer, and a web-based UI for easy access. Fast, lightweight, and ideal for local networks.

items.content_html: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript‚Äîmaking it way harder for scrapers to detect.
items.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript‚Äîmaking it way harder for scrapers to detect.

items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

items.content_html: A lightweight RESTful API built with Node.js and Express.js for managing tasks. Features include user authentication, task creation, updating, deletion, and status tracking. Data is stored in MongoDB with secure access via JWT authentication.
